Now I have all the information I need to generate the parameters for the PATCH endpoint `/v1/posts/{post}`. Based on the controller and request class:

1. The route has a path parameter `{post}` which represents the post ID
2. The update method accepts a PostsRequest which contains the fields that can be updated: title, content, posted_at, author_id, and thumbnail_id
